question: While playing an online game, a link appears on the screen, with no other instructions or words. The link is not related to the current game in any way. Should you click the link?

While playing an online game, a stranger contacts you and offers to give you some limited-edition virtual item in exchange for real-life money, at a much cheaper rate than what you would pay in the store. Should you buy the item from them instead?
It is not okay to share personal information with online friends, especially if you have never met them before.
It is okay to buy something for yourself in-game without your parentâ€™s permission, with their credit card, especially if it's only a few dollars.
If you are meeting online friends in person for the first time, you should go with your parents.
